changeSet.createProcedure:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY pkg_update_association_names AS PROCEDURE update_association_names( p_object_id IN RAW(16), p_object_type IN VARCHAR2(1024), p_object_name IN VARCHAR2(1024) IS BEGIN UPDATE acm_object_association SET cm_parent_name = p_object_name WHERE cm_parent_id = p_object_id AND cm_parent_type = p_object_type;
UPDATE acm_object_association SET cm_target_name = p_object_name WHERE cm_target_id = p_object_id AND cm_target_type = p_object_type; END update_association_names; END pkg_update_association_names;
